WRITING.TITLE: Can anyone help me find this movie?
WRITING.TEXT:
I've been trying to find this movie for a while now but I can't remember what its called for the life of me.
What I know/think;
- War movie (Unsure of whether WW2, Vietnam or Korea) - Produced in the US - American Army in the pacific theater (Unsure if the adversaries are Vietnamese/Chinese/Japanese/Korean) - They spend a lot of the movie holding a hill against the enemy - I remember them blowing up some bridges also - A relatively old film - I would say made between the 50' 70's - I remember the landscape in the movie being quite sparse - IIRC it was a color movie
Any help appreciated!

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone else getting enemies that are completely immune in The Plaguelands?
WRITING.TEXT:
I've noticed a few times that some of the enemies mainly in the Giants husk are completely immune to damage.
This morning I found a Fallen Walker PE in Giants Husk, ran over to complete it to find that the Walkers legs were immune to damage. Not the whole Walker, just the legs.
In the 4 minutes I had on the timer I managed to take off about 1/5th of its health.
Anyone else getting this?
I found just patrolling the plaguelands or going into Archons forge with a ghost that has ether seeds on is crazy effective, but just using an Ether seeds would work too.
Agreed. Would also be better if it didnt take 3 Legendary Marks when infusing a legendary into a legendary. Seeing as you would get 3 for dismantling it instead
Is it just me or does it seem we are having to scale the citadel to capture Skolas or fight the Shade of Oryx a heck of a lot lately?
Node: DIAMOND TRIANGLE SQUARE DIAMOND DIAMOND Original: Third Position, clock-wise Processing Key: Y71JsA== Processing Initialization Vector: H/HFGszR8AaqCL2XvELs2A==
I got Comitatus the other day...
This is called a typo, hadn't even realised that I had put that. It was intended to simply say Bungie.

Oh not a complaint, although a little disappointed there aren't more quests. After last year anything is better, I was amazed when I dropped into the tower to see all the candles, banners the emblem on the traveller. I love it.

Erm I'm sorry... Name calling?
I never, at any point, said they were doing a bad job I love destiny and play it all the time. I would just like to do something with these masks, it would be nice.

WRITING.TITLE: Bungle - Why aren't there more Festival of the Lost quests?
WRITING.TEXT:
Title.
I want more.
I want to use these other masks!
Would do ALL the quests in the world for an Exotic Mask of Mara Sov
Yeah I get that. You are, of course, always guaranteed to get something but thus far I have been very underwhelmed, perhaps doing the raid again will change this but we shall see.

It will make infusion quicker, but not that much quicker in reality considering you get 3-5 drops in a raid. Having to then infuse them into different pieces of gear will take a significant amount of time IMO.
Say you buy a 280/290 Zhalo Supercell from Xur, I dont know the maths but if you were to infuse a 320 primary into it you would need 2 or 3 to get it to max LL. Considering you may get 2-3 of these per week it would take a fair amount of time to fully infuse all the exotics/legendaries that you wanted to keep. Depending, of course, on how many you want.

Yeah I see your point. I suppose for me I don't want to be still grinding out the raid in 6 months time because I'm still only 312 light. Perhaps, as others have suggested getting more frequent drops could make up for this rather than all dropping at 320
Yeah perhaps more guaranteed/Regular drops would make up for this in a way, I hadn't thought of that.
Very true, didn't consider that one.

I disagree but I see your point. I am yet to receive some weapons armour at all despite running NM on every character each week so far so it will still take a while and then after ward you would need to drop this gear again for infusion.

God this does NOT bode well for me. Last time there were gauntlet engrams I bought 5 - 2x sunbreakers, 2x no backup plans and another random one (Can't remember) I didnt need.

WRITING.TITLE: Please make Ward of Dawn what it should always have been - impenetrable
WRITING.TEXT:
Grimoire card for WoD states:
"Open a pocket in the universe, an impregnable fortress for you and your allies. The mighty Ward allows Guardians to hold key points and gather their strength in the face of overwhelming opposition."
I cannot count the amount of times I have used it in Crucible to be instantly broken by a Nova bomb or Golden Gun which then leads to a few of us being slaughtered.
Then there is being killed by the blade dancers Psion-like arc wave through it. Not to mention the Psion's themselves! (Prison of Elders in particular)
Bungie can we please make WoD what it should always have been? Impregnable.
It wouldn't be OP IMO as we still cannot shoot out of it and it ultimately restricts the players inside it to the location it is placed meaning the opposition can wait for it to run out or run into it shotguns blazing still.
Yes it would give those players a chance to cap an objective with very little chance of you taking it back straight away but this leaves you open to go and take another.
Thoughts?
haha dont worry, it happens to us all at some point
It's so frustrating to live outside NA and therefore be unable to get the red bull codes. They are going to be so useful when TK drops
Have you completed all the story missions from HOW? as far as i'm aware that emblem simply indicates there is a mission from HOW to be completed

allegedly they are going to make the TTK collectors edition extras (3x Exotic class items, 3x shaders, emotes etc.) available to people who have the original game, TDB HOW. I read somewhere about it being a $20/20 fee to get the extras. Sounds like it was just digital items though, nothing physical.
Assuming this is correct that would mean you can get the normal TTK and this package for a total of $60/60 minus the physical items.
I'll see if I can find the article I read and link it.
EDIT (Link) - http://www.vg247.com/2015/06/25/destiny-the-taken-king-emotes-sold-separately-dlc/

Seems the prayers have come true, bones of Eao are there!
Yes bring back the B-Line Trauma, I sooooo want that gun.
Got my 3rd Gjallarhorn yesterday from soloing the NF xD

Yes, thats better, I guess. We could have a public forum for discussions such as this in the tower/city

Damn, I knew someone would pick up on that. I'm trying to promote a route away from violence here.

WRITING.TITLE: Please give us something to do besides shooting stuff.
WRITING.TEXT:
I've been thinking this for a while, almost all other games have something else to do besides just shooting/killing things EDIT - this includes punching/palming/knifing. I want some Destiny vices (EDIT I know these aren't all vices). For example;
- Casinos with common games we have today as well as new destiny gambling games - Bungie would probably need to increase glimmer cap for this - but you could have a new currency, casino tokens or something, which you could trade for varying levels of gear. e.g. 100 for a rare weapon, 1000 for a legendary, 10000 for an exotic.
- Sparrow racing, with betting on these races included.
- an exotic dancing club, showcasing all the best that the different races of exo/awoken/human have to offer - every guardian needs to unwind right? - maybe add a bar too with all the finest intergalactic beverages. - A museum or something similar where you can get to grips with the lore of the destiny world without having to go on your laptop to read Grimoire cards - a shooting range where you can go to test out all weapons and see what you think of them, perhaps whilst you are there all the perks for that weapon are activated temporarily to allow you to get a feel for what they will be like when upgraded or if you need to re-roll them.
Personally I would envisage these things to be in the city rather than the tower to try and give us a little more to explore as well other things to do. I'm sure we all have many more ideas than I have listed but it would be nice to do something else.

In FFXIV: ARR (I know its completely different) they have a free company (clan) system which is great, you can rank up the clan to get perks such as bonus xp for doing day-to-day actions such as dungeons and raids. You can also set a clan emblem.
There is also clan housing where you build and customise your own house. Why not have something similar where you can purchase an area of the tower to customise yourself or have a clan ship that you can customise. If all six of your fireteam are clan members you can travel together in this "mother ship" in the loading screens.

Auto fireteam balancing would be great too. Games where you have 6v3 are annoying, just needs to auto balance to make it 5v4 still not quite fair but better. I Joined a game the other day where it was 6v1, why he hadn't left already I don't know.
Also, please bring back the larger (combined arms) maps like last light, I know they can turn into a bit of a sniper fest but some people like that.
Agreed that would be nice to have, Also the ability to skip cutscenes would be a godsend

Warlock. Hunters are pretty poor besides having invisibility and warlocks have self res and nova bomb, although the glide jump takes a little getting used to compared to the Titans beautiful jump.
Make a 'Lock but regardless, Titan master race all day.
